feed.title: Receipt Wrangler Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Receipt Wrangler: v5.4.0
entry.content:
Highlights

  • Added support for custom currency formatting

What's Changed

  • Enhancement/currency formatting by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/302
  • update swagger to remove defaults by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/304

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/compare/v5.3.0...v5.4.0

entry.title: New release for Receipt Wrangler: v5.4.1
entry.content:
Highlights

Test release for capturing and displaying build data

What's Changed

  • enhancement/set-version-data by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/305
  • feature/send-about-data by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/308

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/compare/v5.4.0...v5.4.1

entry.title: New release for Receipt Wrangler: v5.5.0
entry.content:
Highlights

  • Add category tags to items
  • Various bug fixes and tech debt

What's Changed

  • bug/bug fixes by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/310
  • Task/clean up old handlers by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/311
  • bugfix/fix-deleting-new-user by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/314
  • Bug/fix empty prompt by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/315
  • Bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.28.0 to 0.31.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/316
  • Enhancement/add category tag to item by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/321

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/compare/v5.4.1...v5.5.0

entry.title: New release for Receipt Wrangler: v6.0 (Breaking Changes)
entry.content:
Changes

  • Implements Asynq to process receipts in the background
  • Adds activity dashboard widget to see what's happening in the group
  • Redis now requried

Migration guide available here: https://receiptwrangler.io/docs/migration-guide

What's Changed

  • Task/add asynq shell by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/324
  • Feature/quick scan async by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/326
  • Feature/email asynq by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/330
  • Enhancement/add user password support by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/332
  • Feature/add asynq settings to system settings by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/334
  • Feature/add recent activity widget by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/335
  • Enhancements/rc2 fixes by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/337
  • Bugfix/misc fixes by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/341
  • V6.0 by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/342

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/compare/v5.5.0...v6.0

entry.title: New release for Receipt Wrangler: v6.1.0
entry.content:
Highlights

  • Fixed arm builds
  • Updated auth libs to next major version
  • Updated image magick to next major version

What's Changed

  • Bugfix/fix arm builds by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/343
  • uncommited changes by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/346
  • Update set-up-dependencies.sh by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/347
  • Task/update auth libs by @Noah231515 in https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/pull/348

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Receipt-Wrangler/receipt-wrangler-api/compare/v6.0...v6.1.0
